entry.def: Disequilibrium is a state in which things are not stable or certain, but are likely to change suddenly.

example.ex: There may be a period of disequilibrium as family members adjust to the new baby.
example.tran: 宝宝的降生可能会使家庭有一段手忙脚乱的适应阶段。

means.word_mean: 1. loss of equilibrium attributable to an unstable situation in which some forces outweigh others
